resources.string:
Welcome to Draw and Jump!

 Press the create level button to get started.

 Pick a photo from your gallery then press Generate Level.

 Tap the top left corner to rotate the image to the correct direction.

 Tap on the image where you want the player to start, where the end goal is, and where the enemies are.

 Then tap the top right corner to create the level.

 When back to the main menu, press play game.

 Guide your character to the end goal and watch out for monsters.

 Press the left and right buttons to move, and tap jump to jump.
